Game: Back at the Barnyard- Slop Bucket Games 2008-10-20T00:00:00-07:00 Back at the Barnyard: Slop Bucket Games (released PAL regions under the name Back at the Barnyard: Cowlympics) is an action video game released by THQ in 2008 for the Nintendo DS. The game is based on the Nickelodeon cartoon Back at the Barnyard. It received generally negative reviews from critics, receiving a 43.86% from GameRankings. <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/1ad4760b-4aab-4576-9c4d-c521835997d3.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/99885eec-6ede-462f-8f87-09cc87426b41.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/a093804c-b94b-4e40-a706-51c0ad3afc8d.png https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Back_at_the_Barnyard:_Slop_Bucket_Games RP - Rating Pending Action THQ Play THQ
